==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|やぶ|さめ|yomi=k}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|藪|tr1=yabu|t1=bush|雨|tr2=same|t2=rain|lang=ja}}. Literally bush-rain, named after the way that light rainfall falls on a bush.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|[jabusame]|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|やぶさめ}}

# a type of Old-World warbler; a Urosphena squameiceps, {{w|Asian stubtail}}
